alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 8:13PM CDT until May 31 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Harvey County in south central Kansas... Northwestern Butler County in south central Kansas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 813 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Whitewater, moving north to northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of producing large hail. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Potwin, Walton, Elbing and Newton Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
